name: Fast Truck
description:
This is a game where you play as a truck driver that has to deliver a package in just 30 seconds. You have to dodge the passing cars and maybe jump over the trees to get there in time. Good luck!

Note - This game was only created in a week becouse i wasnt able to join the jam until it was already three weeks in.

Code & Art - Arvid Nygrenhttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPIKmnFeB3Vhl1WBcTEZrEQ

Music - Albin Backman https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4naKvkDgmE4ZKwY7e8YBOg?spfreload=5
